## ["report" Package](https://easystats.github.io/report/index.html)

**What is this?**

**Excerpt from site:** report's primary goal is to bridge the gap between R's output and the formatted results contained in your manuscript.
It automatically produces reports of models and dataframes according to best practices guidelines (e.g., APA's style), ensuring standardization and quality in results reporting.

1.  Link to repo here: <https://easystats.github.io/report/index.html>
